name: Mr. Petes is the glue that holds this building together.
name_original: Mr. Petes is the glue that holds this building together.
description:
Mr. Petes is the glue that holds this building together.

-a museum game where you can walk through the process of making an artgame few have played.

Use wasd and mouse to move and look around. The game can be exited by jumping off the world or by pressing alt+f4

The original game, "Mr Petes is lost! (for hugs)" can be downloaded for play on Glorious Trainwrecks.
https://www.glorioustrainwrecks.com/node/10957
